Title: Provides for transferring control of a defendant's connected devices in a family offense proceeding
Summary: Provides that upon motion and after an opportunity to be heard, a court may order the defendant in a family offense proceeding to turn control of a connected device over to a family or household member or, if that is not possible, to have such connected device disabled by the manufacturer.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to transferring control of a defendant's connected devices in a family offense proceeding
